episodes.synopsis: Dan Snow examines medieval butchery and the plague, and dons the platform shoes that Londoners in the 14th century used to navigate the messy streets.
episodes.title: Medieval London

episodes.synopsis: In 18th-century Paris, the disease, poverty and injustice suffered by ordinary citizens prompted one of the most famous revolutions of all time.
episodes.title: Revolutionary Paris

episodes.synopsis: During the Industrial Revolution, desperate immigrants moving to New York were met by parasites, overcrowded tenements, corruption and rotten food.
episodes.title: Industrial New York

video.title: Filthy Cities
video.synopsis: Historian Dan Snow examines the dirt and disease that engulfed London, Paris and New York in centuries past, and how each city cleaned up its act.
